template<typename OtherType >
flusspferd::value::value ( OtherType const &  val  )  [inline, explicit]

Create a new value from a (nearly) arbitrary C++ type value.

Works with any type supported by flusspferd::convert. This overload will not be used for integral types, floating point types or types convertible to flusspferd::object.

Parameters:
val The value to convert.

Convert the value to a string.

void flusspferd::value::unbind (  ) 

Unbind the value.

If the value is a reference to another value, the binding will be removed. Also, the value will be reset to (Javascript) undefined.
